SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.short_name, t.description, t.inner_code, t.parent_id, t.organization_id, t.principal, t.create_date, t.effective_date, t.sys_id, t.tenant_id, t.dr, t.ts, t.def01, t.def02, t.def03, t.def04, t.def05, t.def06, t.def07, t.def08, t.def09, t.def10, t.def11, t.def12, t.def13, t.def14, t.def15, t.def16, t.def17, t.def18, t.def19, t.def20 FROM org_department t WHERE 1=1

SELECT td.id as "id", td.code as "code", td.name as "name", tn.id as "orgId", tn.code as "orgCode", tn.name as "orgName" FROM org_department td INNER JOIN org_organization tn ON td.organization_id=tn.id WHERE 1=1
and td.code = #{condition.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
